feat.name: Bush Adept (HB)
feat.text:
Time spent with nature has born fruit. You gain the following benefits:
• Increase an ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20.
• You gain one bushcraft skill of your choice from the ranger class. You must meet any prerequisites specified in a bushcraft skill in order to take that skill, as normal.
Whenever you gain a level, you can replace the chosen skill with another one from the ranger class. You can take this feat multiple times.
Source: HeavyArms: The Ranger p. 8 (Homebrew)

feat.name: Bushmaster (HB)
feat.text:
You gain two bushcraft skills of your choice from the "Ranger (HeavyArms): Bushcraft" spell list. You must meet any prerequisites specified in a bushcraft skill in order to take that skill, as normal. Whenever you gain a level, you can replace one of the chosen skills with another one from the ranger class. You can take this feat multiple times.
Source: HeavyArms: The Ranger p. 8 (Homebrew)
